amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce the salary of Andrew Light, Assistant Secretary of Energy for International Affairs, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 249 (Roll no. 553).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 249 (Roll no. 553).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
